Guys don't be ass holes to noobs, we were all noobs once.  For those of you who don't know how to download this:

-Mount the .iso with Daemon Tools Lite (Google on how to do this if you don't know)
-Install the game
-Open up Computer, right click the Virtual Drive (Usually E:/ or F:/) and click "explore"
-Copy the contents in the Skidrow folder
-Paste them in the Binaries folder in the Game Directory

If you are getting the physX error, here is the fix.

Go into your installed Homefront directory.
.../Homefront/redist
run PhysX_9.09.1112. This installed it properly for me. Reboot system.
it should run fine after this. 
My system is all AMD, so PhysX  must be running on my cpu.

***WINDOWS 7 USERS***

If you have windows 7 read this. You must use the right click menu option; "run as administrator" option when using setup.exe, or else the extra setup files will not install properly.

This should solve most .dll or physx issues. 

Also for whatever reason, the binary folder in the skidrow section is empty.

Copy ALL the files in "skidrow" into the thq homefront binaries folder instead. 

This will solve any steam issues.

Hi all. This is connected to my previous post. The problem of the tower stuck in Homefront firesale level. For those who have problem with this, pl try this. Do not rush and climb as you reach. Wait till conner says to come up. Then just attempt to climb half way when Rianna pass in front of you up. She will wait on the 1st plat form and you could continue climb. She will follow to the next platform. After the 3rd platform you are supposed to go inside the tower, but don't. Press Z and crawl back all the way down. Crawl back on the floor from where you came between the fire. Go a little further as far as you could and turn back and crawl back up the tower (you may back but I crawled to be on the safe side LOL) and get inside the tower and turn around. You could see Rianna entering the tower and the game will continue. I initially tried this trick a couple of times, of course I did not crawl but walked instead; but I could not make it work and gave up. Now this worked. Hope for all who have this problem, I wish is may work for all and let all could know what the rest of the game is. After this, you have the Goliath but to make it online, first you have to take the soldier with the RPG on the roof top when they appear. So initially you have to take cover, kill the soldiers on the ground and kill the RPG guys for the goliath to bring on line. When you get the goliath on line, you could use it to destroy a Humvee that will show up as well as other vehicles and soldiers. Later use it to bring down a chopper. Rest of the game, play as it comes up. (NB: The goliath will be on line only if and when the RPGs are taken down (the red icon of goliath on your monitor will turn white) or you will get sick shooting and get killed over and over again).
